doc.title: Adventures of the Quest: Visiting the Vampire
doc.plot: Episode 5 - "Visiting the Vampire" The jungles of Belize harbor one of the greatest diversities of bat species in the Americas. Belize is also home to the infamous, blood-sucking Vampire Bat. While the rest of the Quest crew were investigating the local dolphin population offshore, one of the cabin crew was given the opportunity of a lifetime, to confront her greatest fear - Bats! While Mayan ruins, howler monkeys and a thick jungle canopy made tracking the Vampire Bats a challenge, the ingenuity of the Quest team came to the fore and their helicopter was deployed to help decipher the mystery of the Belizean Vampire Bats.
